title: Using CLIVARtools
text: package installed github. ’ll need devtools package installed. interact NOSAMS DB, ’ll need odbc package installed working connection NOSAMS database via ODBC. ODBC connection string stored environment variable called CONSTRING. package tested Microsoft MSSQL driver Windows Mac OS X, unixODBC FreeTDS drivers Linux. Data Source Name (DSN) set within odbc system, CONSTRING variable following format work: can done R Sys.setenv command, may may persistent depending environment.

title: Using CLIVARtools

what: What cruises and stations are available?
title: Using CLIVARtools
text: Use getCruises getStations find data work .
code: cruises <- getCruises() cruises[1:5]  stations <- getStations(cruises[5]) stations[1:5]

title: Using CLIVARtools
text: Use getProfile get data profile. station cruise vectors, getProfile get data cruises/stations requested. station given, profiles cruise cruises returned.
